name: RetroSpect
description:
RetroSpect is a story-based, puzzle game set in a cyberpunk future setting that uses puzzles and player choices as its main method of gameplay and progression. In RetroSpect you take control of Miles as he is on his way meet up with his childhood friend Kali who is the Director of a human augmentation lab. What ensues is a game about morality and choice concerning the effects of human augmentation and the effects of technological progress, perfect for players looking for an interesting story and fun puzzle mechanics.

Approximate length: ~50-60mins

CMPUT 250 2019 Nominee for:

Best Sound Design

Best Art

Game Of The Year
